title: How do I view my replays outside of the client?
body: I have the file downloaded, I know where it is and how to get to it, but I can't find a way to play it. I was told that it can be opened by a browser that supports HTML5, but that doesn't seem to work, or i'm not doing it right. Help me please! And yes, I know I can see them in my match history, but I don't want to see it there.

replies.body: I believe replays are viewable through the updated client.  I'm not aware of any browser or external based methods, currently.  Feel free to share your idea or feedback with our devs through the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion), though.  Good luck!
How do I watch them when they aren't in my match history?
